execution_plan.description: Find users (id, username, full_name) who are members of more than one distinct chat by counting chat_ids in chat_members and joining to the users table for display information.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.full_name, COUNT(DISTINCT cm.chat_id) AS chat_count
FROM chat_members cm
JOIN users u ON cm.user_id = u.id
GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.full_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT cm.chat_id) > 1;
